mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (id, username, password, role, profile_picture_url, email, display_name, status_message, uniqueTag) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, "USER", "default-profile-img-white.png", #{email}, #{displayName}, #{statusMessage}, #{uniqueTag})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM users WHERE users.display_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{displayName}, '%')
AND uniqueTag = #{uniqueTag}

SELECT fr.id, fr.user_id as userId, fr.friend_id as friendId, fr.status, fr.created_at as createdAt, usr.id as usrId, usr.username, usr.password, usr.role, usr.profile_picture_url, usr.email, usr.display_name, usr.status_message, usr.created_at, usr.updated_at, usr.uniquetag FROM friendRequest fr LEFT JOIN users usr ON fr.friend_id = usr.id WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'ACCEPTED'
